Uses of Class
com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKCoordinateRegion

  • Packages that use SKCoordinateRegion 
    Package Description
    com.skobbler.ngx.map
    Constains classses needed to show the map and information on the map.

    • Uses of SKCoordinateRegion in com.skobbler.ngx.map

      Methods in com.skobbler.ngx.map that return SKCoordinateRegion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SKCoordinateRegion SKMapSurfaceView.getCurrentMapRegion()
      Returns the current map visible region.
      Methods in com.skobbler.ngx.map with parameters of type SKCoordinateRegion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SKMapSurfaceView.changeMapVisibleRegion(SKCoordinateRegion newRegion, boolean animate)
      Changes the visible region for the map.
      SKBoundingBox SKMapSurfaceView.getBoundingBoxForRegion(SKCoordinateRegion region)
      Gets the bounding box with the center corresponding to the provided GPS position and zoom.
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onMapRegionChanged(SKCoordinateRegion mapVisibleRegion)
      Notifies when the map region was changed.
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onMapRegionChangeEnded(SKCoordinateRegion mapRegion)
      Notifies when the region of the map finished changing.
      void SKMapSurfaceListener.onMapRegionChangeStarted(SKCoordinateRegion mapRegion)
      Notifies when the region of the map will begin changing.
